name: Lost in the Darkness
description:
Lost In The Darkness is a fun single player game where you, armed with a flashlight, must guide your way through the dark halls and alleyways of your mind avoiding bad thoughts to find the members of your support system. To get rid of bad thoughts use spoons a limited currency that can destroy nearby bad thoughts or find members of your support system who can destroy nearby bad thoughts for you.  Find all three members of your support system in all three levels and maybe a fourth secret member in the third level to win the game. Have fun exploring the halls and good luck!

made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2
